text: Karishma Tanna Bangera (born 21 December 1983) is an Indian actress, model and anchor who predominantly works in Hindi films and television shows. She made her television debut with Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi in 2001. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Actors in Hindi cinema Category:Indian movie actors Category:21st-century Indian actors Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:People from Gujarat Category:Actors in Hindi television Category:Reality television participants
title: Karishma Tanna
